The ZIP files in this directory are the original, unmodified assets from Screaming Brain Studios on itch.io

- https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/tiny-texture-pack
- https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/tiny-texture-pack-2
- https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/tiny-texture-pack-3

The assets were all released under CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0), Public Domain (https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).
